live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
51797.summary: Some customers in the Regent area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
51797.title: July 21 - Winnipeg (Regent) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
